mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WHEREWEGO ( SPOT_NO, USER_NO, SPOT_CATEGORY, SPOT_LOCATION, SPOT_NAME, SPOT_ADDRESS, SPOT_SIZE, SPOT_AMENI, SPOT_IMG, SPOT_RENAMEIMG, SPOT_THEME, SPOT_INTRODUCE, SPOT_INFO, SPOT_STATUS, SPOT_MAPX, SPOT_MAPY, SPOT_ROOMNUM ) VALUES ( SEQ_SPOT_NO.NEXTVAL, 1, '숙소', #{ spotLocation }, #{ spotName }, #{ spotAddress }, #{ spotSize }, #{ ameni }, #{ img }, #{ renameImg }, #{ theme }, #{ introduce }, #{ info }, DEFAULT, #{ spotMapX }, #{ spotMapY }, #{ roomNum } )

INSERT INTO ROOM ( ROOM_NO, SPOT_NO, ROOM_TYPE_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_IMG, ROOM_RENAMEIMG, ROOM_MINFO, ROOM_MAMENI, ROOM_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROOM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ spotNo }, #{ roomTypeNo }, #{ roomName }, #{ roomPrice }, #{ roomImg }, #{ renameRoomImg }, #{ mInfo }, #{ mAmeni }, DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO WHEREWEGO ( SPOT_NO, USER_NO, SPOT_CATEGORY, SPOT_LOCATION, SPOT_NAME, SPOT_ADDRESS, SPOT_SIZE, SPOT_AMENI, SPOT_IMG, SPOT_RENAMEIMG, SPOT_INTRODUCE, SPOT_INFO, SPOT_STATUS, SPOT_MAPX, SPOT_MAPY, SPOT_MENU ) VALUES ( SEQ_SPOT_NO.NEXTVAL, 1, #{ spotCategory }, #{ spotLocation }, #{ spotName }, #{ spotAddress }, #{ spotSize }, #{ ameni }, #{ img }, #{ renameImg }, #{ introduce }, #{ info }, DEFAULT, #{ spotMapX }, #{ spotMapY }, #{ menu } )

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HEART WHERE SPOT_NO = #{spotNo} AND MEM_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(AVG(REV_SCORE),1) FROM REVIEW R JOIN WHEREWEGO W ON (W.SPOT_NO = R.REV_SPOT_NO) WHERE REV_TITLE = #{spotName}
mapper.update: UPDATE WHEREWEGO SET SPOT_SCORE = #{ score } WHERE SPOT_NO = #{ spotNo }
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "R_NO", SPOT_NO, SPOT_CATEGORY, SPOT_LOCATION, SPOT_NAME, SPOT_IMG, SPOT_RENAMEIMG, SPOT_INTRODUCE, SPOT_SCORE, SPOT_STATUS FROM (SELECT * FROM WHEREWEGO WHERE SPOT_SCORE > 0 AND SPOT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SPOT_SCORE DESC)) WHERE R_NO >= 1 AND R_NO <= 10

SELECT W.SPOT_NO, W.USER_NO, W.SPOT_CATEGORY, W.SPOT_LOCATION, W.SPOT_NAME, W.SPOT_ADDRESS, W.SPOT_SIZE, W.SPOT_AMENI, W.SPOT_IMG, W.SPOT_RENAMEIMG, W.SPOT_THEME, W.SPOT_INTRODUCE, W.SPOT_INFO, W.SPOT_STATUS, W.SPOT_MAPX, W.SPOT_MAPY, W.SPOT_ROOMNUM, R.ROOM_PRICE, W.SPOT_SCORE FROM WHEREWEGO W FULL OUTER JOIN ROOM R ON (R.SPOT_NO = W.SPOT_NO) WHERE SPOT_CATEGORY = '숙소' AND SPOT_STATUS = 'Y'
AND W.SPOT_LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{location} || '%'
ORDER BY W.SPOT_NO DESC
ORDER BY W.SPOT_SCORE DESC
ORDER BY R.ROOM_PRICE
ORDER BY R.ROOM_PRICE DESC
